thread.section_title: Hotel Concortel - UPDATED 2017 Reviews & Price Comparison (Paris, France) - TripAdvisor
thread.title: Great service and perfect location!
thread.title_full: Great service and perfect location! - Review of Hotel Concortel, Paris, France - TripAdvisor

author: Alexander G
title: Great service and perfect location!
text:
I really enjoyed the stay at Hotel Concortel since the staff was friendly and the location is just perfect. It is in very close proximity to Place de Madelaine and there you can access two subway lines. It is also just a close walk to Le Louvre and La Fayette gallerias - perfect location.
We lived in a superior room and they were spacy enough, clean with a nice bathroom. Would definetly recommend this hotel for other travelers.
